title: Data Analyst
description: Data analysts collect, process, and perform statistical analyses on large datasets to help organizations make data-driven decisions.
outlook: Excellent with increasing data-driven decision making across industries
learning_resources: Coursera: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
Udemy: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
Kaggle: Learn SQL and Python through hands-on exercises
learning_path: Learn Python for data analysis (Pandas, NumPy)
Practice with real datasets on Kaggle
Build a portfolio of analysis projects

title: UX/UI Designer
description: UX/UI designers create user-friendly interfaces and optimize user experiences for digital products.
outlook: Excellent as digital transformation continues across all sectors
learning_path: Build a portfolio with case studies
Get feedback on designs from real users

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
description: Cybersecurity professionals protect systems, networks, and data from digital attacks.
outlook: Critical need as cyber threats continue to evolve and increase
learning_resources: Coursera: IBM Cybersecurity Analyst Professional Certificate
